name: Sling World Cup
description:
Sling World Cup is a fun 3 vs 3 soccer game for Windows

      

Choose your team from a 18 nationals selection, choose your 3 players and start the 7 rounds tournament to reach the final and win the World Cup!

Use the mouse, click and hold near the player you want to control and release to shoot. The longer your swipe is, the more powerful your moves are.

  • Full coloured retro style pixel art graphics!
  • Fast and immediate gameplay!
  • Funny sounds!
  • 18 worldwide national teams!
  • Infinite random generated players! (10'000 possible combinations!)

You can play a free version of the game (with ads) directly on your browser on Poki:


A game made by rujogames
Idea, code, graphics and music by Marco Rossi
Sounds by Freesound
Additional graphics by When_dies
Additional playtesting by Tom Gunn
(2021)
